verses.roman:
yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas
tat tad evetaro janaḥ
sa yat pramāṇaṁ kurute
lokas tad anuvartate

synonyms: yat yat—however; ācarati—behaves; śreṣṭaḥ—the best man; tat tat—that; eva—certainly; itaraḥ—the lesser; janaḥ—men; saḥ—he; yat—which; pramāṇam—standard; kurute—shows; lokaḥ—the people; tat—that; anuvartate—follow.
translation: "Whatever action is performed by a great man, common men follow. And whatever standards he sets by exemplary acts, all the world pursues."

purport.content: This is a quotation from Bhagavad-gītā (3.21).
